basics.name: Duwage Charitha Perera
basics.label: (PhD Candidate)
basics.summary: I am a PhD candidate in Physical Chemistry in the Chemistry department at the University of Maine. My primary research area is quantum mechanical studies of catalysis using density functional theory. I am currently working on photocatalytic water spitting reaction and metal interactions of glyphosate molecule and its effects on CKDu using density functional theory
